experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: • Collaborate with clients in various domains, across the globe to create, strategize, and implement modules related to multiple enterprise products based on their specific requirements.• Conducting requirement gathering & analyzing them according to the business expectations, writing PRDs/BRDs, liaising with cross-functional teams to address conflicts, & ensuring quality assurance

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: • WB'21 Data team - Quantitative and qualitative analysis of data obtained from primary and secondary research in order to take actionable solutions.• WB'21 Campaign team - Responsible for planning, strategizing, and executing high-impact campaigns such as Duare Sarkar, Didi Ke Bolo, Paraye Samadhan, Bongodhwani Yatra across the state.• WB'21 Field team - Responsible for six assembly constituencies across three districts where analytical & research insights generated were augmented into policy-making and agenda-setting for those assemblies.• Youth in Politics team - Part of planning and strategizing youth in politics platform in order to be launched across the nation.

experience.title: Graduate Engineering Trainee
experience.description: • Conducting market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs related to Screw, Scroll & Centrifugal chillers, Hot Water Generators and Air side products in eastern part of India.• Relationship building & setting up meetings with potential clients and stakeholders including consul- tative selling to understand and customize the product/services as per their needs.• Technical & Commercial analysis of chilled water HVAC Projects, intelligence gathering and data reporting to management for developing strategies for business development.
experience.description_html: • Conducting market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs related to Screw, Scroll & Centrifugal chillers, Hot Water Generators and Air side products in eastern part of India.• Relationship building & setting up meetings with potential clients and stakeholders including consul- tative selling to understand and customize the product/services as per their needs.• Technical & Commercial analysis of chilled water HVAC Projects, intelligence gathering and data reporting to management for developing strategies for business development.

experience.title: Research Summer Intern
experience.description: • Guide: Dr. Amaresh Dalal, Professor, IIT Guwahati.• Title: Forced convective flow and heat transfer in a topologically patterned cylinder.• Analyze the regime of fluid flow, simulated in ANSYS Fluent under desired thermodynamical conditions and the following properties Nusselt number, Reynolds number, Prandtl number, vorticity past a topologically patterned cylinder were observed. The designing of the model was done using GAMBIT & MATLAB.
experience.description_html: • Guide: Dr. Amaresh Dalal, Professor, IIT Guwahati.• Title: Forced convective flow and heat transfer in a topologically patterned cylinder.• Analyze the regime of fluid flow, simulated in ANSYS Fluent under desired thermodynamical conditions and the following properties Nusselt number, Reynolds number, Prandtl number, vorticity past a topologically patterned cylinder were observed. The designing of the model was done using GAMBIT & MATLAB. <!---->

education.title: Jadavpur University
education.description: Activities and Societies: · Jadavapur University Photographic Club · Organizing Committee Member (Communication and Marketing) of Jadavpur University, Department of Mechanical Engineering Reunion 2016 and 2017. · Organizing Committee Member of International Workshop on Sustainable Energy, Power and Propul- sion organized by ISEES, co- organized by IITK, University of Maryland & University of Illinois in 2015. · Collaborated with friends and founded the basic idea of JU Department of Mechanical Engineering SAE Club, now registered as “Xlr8” under SAE… Show more

education.title: Birla High School
education.description: Activities and Societies: · Obtained the “Best Cadet Award” and “A” certificate under “National Cadet Corps (NCC), Airwing squadron, Jadavpur University, West Bengal Division” along with a cash scholarship in 2011. · Was an active member of Helpage India during 2001-2008. · Was awarded the Merit Scholarship by Coal India Limited for performance in CBSE 2013 board examinations (Class XIIth). · Achieved highest marks in Mathematics, Science & Computer Science multiple times in the span of 10 years. · Secured AIR<500 in IMO, NSO, and ASSET multiple times during 2005-2010.

projects: [{"title":"Optimized design of truss structure using genetic algorithm.","start_date":"Jun 2016","end_date":"May 2017","description":"Bachelors Thesis Project July 2016 - April 2017· Guide: Dr. Sanjib Acharya, Professor, Jadavpur University.· Title: Optimized design of truss structure using genetic algorithm.· Designing of a truss structure using Genetic Algorithm and also validate results using Kuhn-Tuckertheorem, hence also draw a comparative analysis."},{"title":"Forced convective flow and heat transfer in a topologically patterned cylinder.","start_date":"May 2015","end_date":"Jul 2015","description":"· Guide: Dr. Amaresh Dalal, Professor, IIT Guwahati.· Title: Forced convective flow and heat transfer in a topologically patterned cylinder.· Analyze the regime of fluid flow, simulated in ANSYS Fluent under desired thermodynamical conditions and the following properties Nusselt number, Reynolds number, Prandtl number, vorticity past a topologically patterned cylinder were observed. The designing of the model was done using GAMBIT & MATLAB."}]
